title: Macbook Air A1466 - 820-00165 Not detect ssd
message:
I changed logic board and the newboard cant detect ssd 
i have external usb hd and when i put it in usb port with out booting from it the motherboard detect the ssd 
and when i remove the usb drive the motherboard cant detect it again
i think something in the bios but i dont have idea to update it or take the old files from the harddisk

title: Macbook Air A1466 - 820-00165 Not detect ssd
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

You probably have High Sierra, or newer macOS installed.
New board BIOS doesn't support APFS.
Take an empty SSD and do a fresh install; this way BIOS is automatically updated.
Then put back original SSD...

title: Macbook Air A1466 - 820-00165 Not detect ssd
